scone.color



enum Color: int;
All colors

Example:
//Available colors:
black
black_dark
blue
blue_dark
cyan
cyan_dark
green
green_dark
magenta
magenta_dark
red
red_dark
white
white_dark
yellow
yellow_dark


enum int ilcs;
Index Light Color Start

enum int idcs;
Index Dark Color Start

enum int ilce;
Index Light Color End

enum int idce;
Index Dark Color Start

struct fg;
Foreground type

Example:
frame.write(0,0, fg(Color.red), "scone"); //Writes "scone" in red


struct bg;
Background type

Example:
frame.write(0,0, bg(Color.red), "scone"); //Writes "scone" white with a red background


auto darkColorFromColor(Color c);
Get dark color variant from color

Returns:
Dark variant of 
Color
. If not a light color, return input

auto lightColorFromColor(Color c);
Get light color variant from color

Returns:
Light variant of 
Color
. If not a dark color, return input

auto colorIsDark(Color c);
Check if a color is dark

Returns:
true if color is a dark variant

auto colorIsLight(Color c);
Check if a color is light

Returns:
true if color is a light variant
